name: Cube Zoyt
description:
Hi this is my first game as a 14 years old solo developer.The gameplay on Youtube is an old video so there might be more features.The main game is made around 1 week but there are some features that i added after the game is finished.

The game was not meant to be played as a competitive game or grind type of game.The game was meant to be chill and relaxing so i made the audio in the game with slow tempo to maintain the relaxation.
